ISSUE.TITLE: Test errors: djet does not have utils module
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When implementing a test today, I noticed a multitude of errors like this: ``` ImportError: cannot import name 'utils' from 'djet' (/Users/josh/.local/share/virtualenvs/djoser-uPyIej47/lib/python3.7/site-packages/djet/__init__.py) ``` This module was removed in https://github.com/sunscrapers/djet/commit/50579d9c42b2955547ba724175e5f17f7fa74943. We should update our tests to reflect this.
